mcq.statement: Choose the correct example of a complex sentence: Although it was raining, we went for a walk., She was hungry, so she ate an apple., He likes football, but his brother prefers basketball., The sun set, and the stars appeared.

options.a: Although it was raining, we went for a walk.
options.b: She was hungry, so she ate an apple.
options.c: He likes football, but his brother prefers basketball.
options.d: The sun set, and the stars appeared.
